channel.title: meta on Datumorphism
channel.description: Recent content in meta on Datumorphism

item.title: About
item.description: Datumorphism is my notebook about machine learning, programming, data, statistics, and data visualization. Most of the topics are here because I need them in my work or personal projects. To organize the notes more elegantly, I created a hugo theme called connectome to host them. The essence of the theme is to enable bi-directional connections between them. This website is mostly designed to be a reference book for myself.
